title: Dse Chem stability of a compound

replies.msg:
Enthalpy Entropy?

Given enthalpy of formation of ClO2 is +102KJ

請問如何comment on the stability of ClO2?

我個人角度單睇enthalpy change去判斷stability唔可取，因為chem世界太多特例：
Eg NaCl(s) --dissociation--> Na+ Cl-
A overall endothermic reaction
Na+ Cl- ions are stable

所以想請問各位朋友，點判斷stability?

Enthalpy Entropy?

Given enthalpy of formation of ClO2 is +102KJ

請問如何comment on the stability of ClO2?

我個人角度單睇enthalpy change去判斷stability唔可取，因為chem世界太多特例：
Eg NaCl(s) --dissociation--> Na+ Cl-
A overall endothermic reaction
Na+ Cl- ions are stable

所以想請問各位朋友，點判斷stability?

你下邊講緊咩
formation of ClO2 is +102KJ= Cl+o2喎
你下邊NaCl dissociation Na+ Cl- 係NACL變返NA 同CL喎
formation of ClO2 is +102KJ姐係佢要energy form bond, energy profile高, dissociation of ClO2 = 負102KJ 姐係 CIO2 跟本唔stable 因為佢formation 係positive values,而愈positive舊野愈唔stable, 你睇返formation of nacl係負幾百KJ就會知點解NACL咁鬼stable嫁啦

Enthalpy Entropy?

Given enthalpy of formation of ClO2 is +102KJ

請問如何comment on the stability of ClO2?

我個人角度單睇enthalpy change去判斷stability唔可取，因為chem世界太多特例：
Eg NaCl(s) --dissociation--&gt; Na+ Cl-
A overall endothermic reaction
Na+ Cl- ions are stable

所以想請問各位朋友，點判斷stability?

你下邊講緊咩
formation of ClO2 is +102KJ= Cl+o2喎
你下邊NaCl dissociation Na+ Cl- 係NACL變返NA 同CL喎
formation of ClO2 is +102KJ姐係佢要energy form bond, energy profile高, dissociation of ClO2 = 負102KJ 姐係 CIO2 跟本唔stable 因為佢formation 係positive values,而愈positive舊野愈唔stable, 你睇返formation of nacl係負幾百KJ就會知點解NACL咁鬼stable嫁啦


師兄，你誤會我意思了
我以enthalpy value of dissociation of nacl : +ve 帶出overall endothermic , product 都可以係stable

單靠睇value of enthalpy change is not reliable in this sense

Enthalpy Entropy?

Given enthalpy of formation of ClO2 is +102KJ

請問如何comment on the stability of ClO2?

我個人角度單睇enthalpy change去判斷stability唔可取，因為chem世界太多特例：
Eg NaCl(s) --dissociation--&amp;gt; Na+ Cl-
A overall endothermic reaction
Na+ Cl- ions are stable

所以想請問各位朋友，點判斷stability?

你下邊講緊咩
formation of ClO2 is +102KJ= Cl+o2喎
你下邊NaCl dissociation Na+ Cl- 係NACL變返NA 同CL喎
formation of ClO2 is +102KJ姐係佢要energy form bond, energy profile高, dissociation of ClO2 = 負102KJ 姐係 CIO2 跟本唔stable 因為佢formation 係positive values,而愈positive舊野愈唔stable, 你睇返formation of nacl係負幾百KJ就會知點解NACL咁鬼stable嫁啦


師兄，你誤會我意思了
我以enthalpy value of dissociation of nacl : +ve 帶出overall endothermic , product 都可以係stable

單靠睇value of enthalpy change is not reliable in this sense

你DSE要學依D野咩? 因為DSE冇學得咁深入, dissociation of nacl 其實個energy profile 係高左,證明 而且你唔明formation個concept, formation個concept係用element合,而你 dissociation of naCL只係出返NA CL既ion 唔可以咁樣去比較,而且當NA甩左粒電子,同CL食左粒電子,佢地當中會有affinity energy 合完仲會有lattice energy 如果你讀DSE其實就咁記左 正係唔STABLE,負係STALBE就OK

Ic
我出po原因只係想知以dse黎講，是否記+ - is ok

因為我都唔想深究，考試導向

Enthalpy Entropy?

Given enthalpy of formation of ClO2 is +102KJ

請問如何comment on the stability of ClO2?

我個人角度單睇enthalpy change去判斷stability唔可取，因為chem世界太多特例：
Eg NaCl(s) --dissociation--&amp;gt; Na+ Cl-
A overall endothermic reaction
Na+ Cl- ions are stable

所以想請問各位朋友，點判斷stability?

你下邊講緊咩
formation of ClO2 is +102KJ= Cl+o2喎
你下邊NaCl dissociation Na+ Cl- 係NACL變返NA 同CL喎
formation of ClO2 is +102KJ姐係佢要energy form bond, energy profile高, dissociation of ClO2 = 負102KJ 姐係 CIO2 跟本唔stable 因為佢formation 係positive values,而愈positive舊野愈唔stable, 你睇返formation of nacl係負幾百KJ就會知點解NACL咁鬼stable嫁啦


師兄，你誤會我意思了
我以enthalpy value of dissociation of nacl : +ve 帶出overall endothermic , product 都可以係stable

單靠睇value of enthalpy change is not reliable in this sense

另外你concept都錯左你dissociation of nacL 出既product邊到stable, 你有冇聽過世界有物質係會以離子form存在? 所以離子係一D都唔stable
唔stable點做好? 咪form compound囉,FORM完NACL就變到好STABLE 所以就負幾百KJ,而dissociation of nacL就係令到佢唔STABLE就係正幾百KJ啦

Enthalpy Entropy?

Given enthalpy of formation of ClO2 is +102KJ

請問如何comment on the stability of ClO2?

我個人角度單睇enthalpy change去判斷stability唔可取，因為chem世界太多特例：
Eg NaCl(s) --dissociation--&amp;amp;gt; Na+ Cl-

你下邊講緊咩
formation of ClO2 is +102KJ= Cl+o2喎
你下邊NaCl dissociation Na+ Cl- 係NACL變返NA 同CL喎
formation of ClO2 is +102KJ姐係佢要energy form bond, energy profile高, dissociation of ClO2 = 負102KJ 姐係 CIO2 跟本唔stable 因為佢formation 係positive values,而愈positive舊野愈唔stable, 你睇返formation of nacl係負幾百KJ就會知點解NACL咁鬼stable嫁啦

Enthalpy Entropy?



Given enthalpy of formation of ClO2 is +102KJ



請問如何comment on the stability of ClO2?



我個人角度單睇enthalpy change去判斷stability唔可取，因為chem世界太多特例：

Eg NaCl(s) --dissociation--> Na+ Cl-

A overall endothermic reaction

Na+ Cl- ions are stable



所以想請問各位朋友，點判斷stability?


首先thermodynamics係relative stability
通常係pdt 同reagent比較
而判斷佢relative stability 係用eqm constant去characterize
而唔係energy
Gibb's energy 只係判斷個process係咪spontaneous (發唔發生到)
而G=H-TS S term唔太重要除非有gas generation -> G=H
dG=dH=-RTlnK, if G/H>0, then K <1, which means the reaction favors reactant sid
所以可以話佢PDT stability比REAGENT 低
但comment唔到佢自己既stability

利申 鳩UP隨時錯concept

首先thermodynamics係relative stability
通常係pdt 同reagent比較
而判斷佢relative stability 係用eqm constant去characterize
而唔係energy
Gibb's energy 只係判斷個process係咪spontaneous (發唔發生到)
而G=H-TS S term唔太重要除非有gas generation -> G=H
dG=dH=-RTlnK, if G/H>0, then K <1, which means the reaction favors reactant sid
所以可以話佢PDT stability比REAGENT 低
但comment唔到佢自己既stability

利申 鳩UP隨時錯concept

了解des!

dse黎講只需三個point
1)positive enthalpy change of formation
2)endothermic
3)so it's stable
